result.ga: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.orig: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.html: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a dtosca maraċtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.html: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir linn é a ṫaḃairt isteaċ toisc a ṁéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: I have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ga: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.orig: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh
result.html: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamhI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ponchtml: Tá orm hata a ċaiṫeaṁ toisc go ḃfuil an ġrian ag taitneaṁI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
